verbs.description: [ARG1: sooners and cowboys] [V: fall] [ARG4: in new polls] [C-ARG1: oklahoma and oklahoma state football teams both fell in the two major college football polls out sunday] [ARGM-TMP: after suffering big 12 losses on saturday] oklahoma slipped to 11th in both the associated press and coaches polls after losing to texas 48 - 45 in dallas sooners
